entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
